hero.title: Men’s, Women’s & Children’s Hairdressing
hero.subtitle: Personalized beauty care for everyone – right in Petržalka. We offer precise men’s and women’s haircuts, beard grooming, children’s haircuts, professional coloring, highlights, and hair extensions – all in an elegant and welcoming atmosphere.

offer.title: Your Path to the Perfect Look
offer.subtitle: Whatever you’re looking for, you’ll find it here – with style and confidence. Every detail is carefully considered so you feel special – from the first greeting to the final styling.

info.title: Need a change?
info.subtitle: Book an appointment with us and enjoy quality services in a pleasant environment. Our experts will take care of your perfect look.

about_us.title: Who Will Take Care of You?
about_us.text: Behind every smile of our customers is one skilled woman. Our hairdresser is young, talented, and passionately dedicated to her work. She approaches each client individually, focusing on detail and your style. Her goal is for you to not only feel great with us but also look your best.

contact.title: Visit Us
contact.subtitle: Our salon is located in the heart of Petržalka. Modern environment, easy accessibility, and top-notch services – come enjoy a moment just for yourself.

opening_hours.title: Opening Hours
opening_hours.subtitle: Visit us anytime during these hours. We recommend booking in advance.
opening_hours.tip: For the best experience, we recommend booking in advance. You can contact us by phone or use our online booking system.

footer.subtitle: A place where hair care becomes an experience. We combine quality, style, and a personal approach into every visit – from classic cuts to modern transformations.
